summary: Tested file upload functionality and homepage brands section. Homepage brands working correctly, backend upload endpoint functional, but static file serving has issues in production environment.

critical_bugs.issue: Static file serving returns HTML content instead of image files
critical_bugs.impact: Uploaded images cannot be displayed properly

minor_issues.issue: Only 1 category found instead of expected 6 from seed data

ui_bugs.issue: Categories tab selector [data-value='categories'] not found, preventing navigation to categories section

passed_tests: Homepage brands section displays all 6 required brands (FAG, HENGST, MANN+HUMMEL, PACCAR, SAF, BPW)
Homepage responsive design works on desktop and mobile
Product creation modal has 'Загрузить изображение' button
Product URL input works as fallback for images
Backend /api/upload endpoint accepts files and returns proper JSON response
Admin authentication for file upload works
Product creation with image URL works successfully
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix static file serving configuration for /uploads/ route in production environment. Files upload successfully but cannot be accessed properly (returns HTML instead of images). Also investigate categories tab navigation issue in admin panel.
